Posts.Content: Hi folks just wondering if anyone is having herceptin treatment and taking anastrozole as well. I've had chemo and radiotherapy and think I was quite lucky with side effects etc but at the moment feeling worse on herceptin and anastrozole...aching everywhere, just recently been getting nose bleeds. Is anyone in this same position. Xxx
Posts.Title: Breast cancer treatment - Herceptin and anastrozole

Posts.Content: Thankyou Judith, like you say it's getting the one that suits! Â It' good to be able to talk to people in the same situation. Best wishes kim xx
Posts.Title: Breast cancer treatment - Herceptin and anastrozole

Posts.Content: Thankyou lesley, yes I suppose it's just trial and error. I cant really pinpoint which is making me worse. I'm on herceptin until February so will probably see then. I have got appointments coming up so will mention it then as well. Will keep taking the painkillers and get out in this lovely weather, always makes you feel better. Xxx
Posts.Title: Breast cancer treatment - Herceptin and anastrozole

Posts.Content: Good luck with the chemo...know what you mean just want to get on with it...xxx
Posts.Title: Finally ready !
